Permit Due Diligence
Dossier.

A decision-ready PDF for any LA-area address: timeline, current status, approved scope, open items (when public), and risk flags. Optional public record pulls when portals are missing details.

Pay $499 (Online Only) Text ADDRESS + FILE Proof

24–48h online • Retrieval depends on counter hours/queues (often 2–5 business days)

What you get

✓
Timeline (application → issuance → revisions → final/expiration)
✓
Status snapshot as publicly shown (issued/finaled/expired/void/etc.)
✓
Approved scope summary (what work is actually permitted)
✓
Open items (missing finals, listed corrections/notes when public)
✓
Risk flags (expired permits, repeated corrections, mismatched scope/address)
✓
Source bundle (portal exports + retrieved public documents if requested)

Best use cases

✓
Bid validation: confirm scope/status before quoting
✓
Purchase diligence: verify permits and identify open exposure
✓
Closeout: understand what’s blocking final sign-off
✓
Expeditor support: fast research + document pulls
Public records only. Some documents may be restricted, require owner authorization, specific identifiers, appointments, or agency processing time. Plan sets and blueprints require owner authorization. If access is restricted, we document the limitation and provide next-step options. Research and document retrieval support only. Not legal advice.

Submit the address + goal. If you already paid, submit this and we’ll start immediately.

What to include
Address, permit number (if known), deadline, and what you need verified (timeline, status, scope, risk flags, docs).

Submit

After submit: you’ll get a confirmation. If you already paid, include the address and we’ll start.

How it works

01 / Intake

Address/permit number, goal (bid/buy/closeout), deadline, and which documents you want pulled.

02 / Research

Online pull first. If needed, optional in-person public record retrieval (counters/records offices).

03 / Delivery

PDF dossier + source bundle folder you can forward to a partner, client, or team.

FAQ

Can you pull full plan sets?

Sometimes plan sets are restricted. If authorization is required, you’ll get a clear list of what’s needed and what public alternatives exist (permit cards, inspection history, correction notices, public attachments).

What if a document can’t be retrieved?

You still receive the online dossier plus a “missing items + next steps” list. Retrieval fees are not charged if a document is not obtained.

What areas do you cover?

Los Angeles region and surrounding cities. Text the address and you’ll get a feasibility confirmation before any retrieval work starts.

Is this legal advice?

No. This is public records research and document retrieval support. For legal questions, use an attorney. For trade/field conditions, use licensed professionals.
